nodes.text: The T-345 was a type of blaster wielded by a Gran bounty hunter during the Great Hunt of Malastare around 3 ABY. During the hunt, the Gran was killed by the Trandoshan bounty hunter Bossk who wished to use the blaster, but discarded it after realizing that the blaster's trigger was too small for his fingers.
The T-345 first appeared in Bounty Hunters 11. The comic was written by Ethan Sacks, illustrated by Paolo Villanelli, and released on April 14, 2021.
